data.text:
“A wonderful interpreter of Americana music”

John Michael Wright is originally from Essex, England and is now based in Sydney, Australia.

John is skilled at making a song his own, and wooing a crowd with his feel-good, relaxed acoustic sounds, beautiful vocals and his upbeat sense of humour.

John’s talent in creative songwriting has produced a rich collection of original songs, reflecting on his own life experiences, exploring the heartfelt joys and disappointments of life that any audience will relate to.
